Seems this trip is turning =
out to be a Bakumatsu trip after all.  
Today I walked over to the Imperial=
 palace, and then from there to 
Sanjo bridge, and got some pics of it. Not=
 sure where the whole Sanjo 
Seisatsu incident took place, but I probably w=
alked over it at some 
point.  Also added to the pebble collection with a p=
ebble from the 
grounds of the imperial palace, and one from the riverbank =
of the 
kamo river under sanjo bridge. So your daughter won't get a handful=
 
of dirt, but I can send some pebbles.  I'll keep track of just where 
I g=
ot them :D
